fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select someone to punch out all their blood.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Spinebreaker (2319) will always spawn.
- Your target is not notified you punched out all their blood until they die from it.
- Speaking of, every hour, the host rolls a d5, if it rolls a 1, your target from last night spontaneously loses all their blood and fucking dies. If they don't die by the end of the day, they die immediately before the night.
- You win with Spinebreaker (2319), and have a factional chat with them.
